select id,cdate,type,object,count,state from (
select c.id id,c.cdate cdate,'盘点' type,maker.user_name object,round(sum(ifnull(d.stock_count,0)),2) count, case when c.state='1' then '已完成' when c.state='0' then '未完成' when c.state='-1' then '已取消' end state from vmes_warehouse_check c left join vmes_warehouse_check_detail d on d.parent_id = c.id left join vmes_user maker on maker.id = c.make_id
and c.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
and c.state in ('0','1')
group by c.id
union all
select i.id id,i.cdate cdate,dict.name type,i.dept_name object,round(sum(ifnull(d.count,0)),2) count, case when i.state='1' then '已完成' when i.state='0' then '未完成' when i.state='-1' then '已取消' end state from vmes_warehouse_in i left join vmes_warehouse_in_detail d on d.parent_id = i.id left join vmes_dictionary dict on dict.id = i.type
and i.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
and i.state in ('0','1') group by i.id
union all
select o.id id,o.cdate cdate,dict.name type,o.dept_name object,round(sum(ifnull(d.count,0)),2) count, case when o.state='1' then '已完成' when o.state='0' then '未完成' when o.state='-1' then '已取消' end state from vmes_warehouse_out o left join vmes_warehouse_out_detail d on d.parent_id = o.id left join vmes_dictionary dict on dict.id = o.type
and o.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
and o.state in ('0','1') group by o.id
)tab
order by tab.cdate desc
